libraries.libtbx: used for finding python files in the repository
libraries.LS49: a specific repository containing the script step5_batch.py

script_steps: create a directory with the job ID
run the script 'step5_batch.py' with 42 MPI ranks, 7 MPI tasks per resource set, 7 CPU cores per resource set and 6 resource sets per node
copy files from the burst buffer to the local GPFS
check that the files have been written to local GPFS
details.comments: The script uses the jsrun command to launch the 'step5_batch.py' script on the Summit supercomputer. The script utilizes the burst buffer and GPFS file system for data storage and processing. The script also sets up various environment variables for the application to run correctly, including specifying the GPU type, data transfer method, and logging preferences.
